description.value: An unassuming brass eyepiece that can be fitted for any species’ visual sensors, a monocle of recognition helps you better tell friend from foe. While wearing it, you gain a +2 enhancement bonus to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.gZlg2ZKze0erNLmP]{Perception} checks to pierce a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.aayAhTaRzitONs5U]{Disguise} and to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.nBrYkGfNBJAHe0xJ]{Sense Motive} checks to sense mental effects.

modifiers.name: Monocle of recognition
modifiers.notes: you gain a +2 enhancement bonus to Perception checks to pierce a disguise and to Sense Motive checks to sense mental effects.
